title: Was the Xbox Showcase a Masterpiece?!
description:
Could this be one of the best "E3" conferences of all-time? 

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TMChfODRgJ8 

Download Vampire Survivors on Switch, PC, Xbox, and Mobile RIGHT NOW! PlayStation coming soon!



FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
